item.title: Synthetic Biologics Inc 10-K
item.description: Synthetic Biologics Inc, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 16, 2022 had 43014 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: clinical - 436 instances stock - 424 instances may - 393 instances company - 334 instances vcn - 315 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
